mapper.select: select user_id,role_id from admin_app_user_role where user_id=#{userId}

select au.id as user_id,0 as role_id,au.user_name as name,ad.id as depart_id from admin_depart ad join admin_depart_user adu on ad.id = adu.depart_id and ad.is_deleted=1 join admin_user au on au.is_delete = 1 and au.id = adu.user_id join system_connection_list scl on au.id = scl.user_id and scl.is_delete =1 and au.is_delete=1

select aaur.user_id as user_id,aaur.role_id as role_id,au.user_name as name,ad.id as depart_id from admin_app_user_role aaur join admin_user au on aaur.user_id = au.id and au.is_delete=1 and aaur.role_id=#{id} join system_connection_list scl on au.id = scl.user_id and scl.is_delete =1 and au.is_delete=1 join admin_depart_user adu on au.id = adu.user_id join admin_depart ad on ad.id = adu.depart_id and ad.is_deleted=1
mapper.delete: delete from admin_app_user_role where user_id=#{uid} and role_id=#{roleid}
